translations: 当裁判；当仲裁人（umpire 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Although TV highlights mistakes, Platini refuses to contemplate instant video umpiring.
sentences.translation: 尽管电视突出了这些错误，普拉蒂尼却拒绝考虑采用实时录像作为判决依据。

sentences.sentence: Trooper Chad McWilliams was umpiring a Little League baseball game on his day off when his cell phone rang.
sentences.translation: 节假日当骑兵查德·威廉姆斯手机响时，他正在为少年棒球联合会的棒球比赛当裁判。

sentences.sentence: The umpiring work of basketball game is an essential part in basketball teaching, training and game organization.
sentences.translation: 篮球裁判工作是学校篮球教学、训练和组织竞赛不可缺少的内容。
